$comment: ⚠️ BEFORE ADDING DEPENDENCIES: Read /frontend/docs/DEPENDENCIES.md | BANNED: recharts, lucide-react, framer-motion, lodash, moment | Current bundle: 107 KB (target: <150 KB) | Run 'pnpm analyze' after adding packages
name: seekr

scripts.check-deps: node -e "const banned=['recharts','chart.js','victory','lucide-react','react-icons','heroicons','framer-motion','react-spring','lodash','moment','jquery']; const pkg=require('./package.json'); const found=banned.filter(b=>pkg.dependencies[b]||pkg.devDependencies[b]); if(found.length){console.error('❌ BANNED dependencies found:',found.join(', '),'\n   See docs/DEPENDENCIES.md'); process.exit(1);} else {console.log('✅ No banned dependencies');}"
scripts.bundle-check: pnpm build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const manifest=require('./.next/build-manifest.json'); const sizes=Object.entries(manifest.pages).map(([page,files])=>({page,size:files.reduce((acc,f)=>acc+fs.statSync('.next/'+f).size,0)})); sizes.forEach(({page,size})=>{const kb=Math.round(size/1024); if(kb>150){console.error('❌',page,'is',kb,'KB (exceeds 150 KB limit)'); process.exit(1);} else {console.log('✅',page,'-',kb,'KB');}}); console.log('\n✅ All routes under 150 KB budget');"
